sentence.text: This finding expands the lists of the phosphorylation-positive tumors, and ALK-positive extramedullary plasmacytoma may benefit from the treatment of ALK inhibitor in the future

We studied 46 cases of extramedullary plasmacytoma by immunostaining with anti-phosphorylation antibody and fluorescence in situ hybridization (FISH) analysis using an ALK break-apart probe and found one case to be ALK protein-positive and demonstrated the disruption of the ALK gene in this case.
